name: PAC MAN (milk studios)
description:
DESCRIPTION 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

my version of the popular game 

PAC MAN but some thing seems wrong? 

can you beat the ghost in there game in cat and mouse

CHARATERS

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PAC MAN

FINDER

HIDDEN ONE

LOST ONE

THE DEAD ONE

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LOGS

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

December/3/2002

me and friend (Jon) wanted to make a pac man game  , we are currently making the engine its not the smoothest engine but we can clean it up, i want to show it to the public next year

August /5/2003

so the engine glitching out the ghost and walls keep turning back witch makes it hell to beta test and play, and when Pac man gets a power pelt the ghost glitch out and turn red with black eye, we are putting in a border to give it that arcade esthetic and were running out of time to finish it

July/1/2004

so the game is 1 year behind and the public doesn't even now about of this game, and I've been working on the game engine with Jon hope fully it works

July/6/2004

so I Bandon the game we are working I want to work on different game this is going to be my last log Jon said that he is going to keep working on the engine that I made with him Jon said that he is going to keep doing the logs so that means that the next logs will be Jon

December/23/2015

 IVE FANILY GOT IT TO WORK , THE SOUL CAPTURE SYSTEM I PUT SOME ONE IN THE GAME I NOW WHAT IM GOING TO DO WITH THIS GAME, THIS WILL BE THE GAME LAST LOG
